com.netflix.spectator.placeholders

Interface PlaceholderFactory


  • public interface PlaceholderFactory
    Factory for creating instances of activity based meters with placeholders in the identifiers so that the final id can be resolved when the activity takes place.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      com.netflix.spectator.api.Counter counter(PlaceholderId id)
      Measures the rate of some activity.
      PlaceholderId createId(String name)
      Creates an identifier with placeholders for a counter, timer, or distribution summary.
      PlaceholderId createId(String name, Iterable<TagFactory> tagFactories)
      Creates an identifier with placeholders for a counter, timer, or distribution summary.
      com.netflix.spectator.api.DistributionSummary distributionSummary(PlaceholderId id)
      Measures the rate and variation in amount for some activity.
      static PlaceholderFactory from(com.netflix.spectator.api.Registry registry)
      Create a new instance of the factory.
      com.netflix.spectator.api.Timer timer(PlaceholderId id)
      Measures the rate and time taken for short running tasks.

    • Method Detail

      • from

        static PlaceholderFactory from(com.netflix.spectator.api.Registry registry)
        Create a new instance of the factory.
        Parameters:
        registry - the registry to use when creating ids

      • createId

        PlaceholderId createId(String name)
        Creates an identifier with placeholders for a counter, timer, or distribution summary.
        Parameters:
        name - Description of the measurement that is being collected.
        Returns:
        The newly created identifier.

      • createId

        PlaceholderId createId(String name,
                       Iterable<TagFactory> tagFactories)
        Creates an identifier with placeholders for a counter, timer, or distribution summary.
        Parameters:
        name - Description of the measurement that is being collected.
        tagFactories - Other factories that can generate other dimensions that can be used to classify the measurement.
        Returns:
        The newly created identifier.

      • counter

        com.netflix.spectator.api.Counter counter(PlaceholderId id)
        Measures the rate of some activity. A counter is for continuously incrementing sources like the number of requests that are coming into a server.
        Parameters:
        id - Identifier created by a call to createId(java.lang.String)

      • distributionSummary

        com.netflix.spectator.api.DistributionSummary distributionSummary(PlaceholderId id)
        Measures the rate and variation in amount for some activity. For example, it could be used to get insight into the variation in response sizes for requests to a server.
        Parameters:
        id - Identifier created by a call to createId(java.lang.String)

      • timer

        com.netflix.spectator.api.Timer timer(PlaceholderId id)
        Measures the rate and time taken for short running tasks.
        Parameters:
        id - Identifier created by a call to createId(java.lang.String)
